item.title: What to bring if you are invited to an Italian Dinner
item.description: TL;DR Really good quality Olive Oil Nice wine I’m writing this story because this was my first invitation by an Italian friend to her house amongst a bunch of friends. I did know what to bring that time. According to her, she was going to cook EVERYTHING and therefore, what could you bring? Questions that arised were: Will you go for something safe such as nice wine?
